alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Laurens; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Laurens, northwestern Dodge, eastern Pulaski and Bleckley Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Gresston, or near Eastman, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Eastman, Chester, Dexter, Cadwell, Chauncey, Rentz, Dubois, Plainfield, Empire, Mobley Crossing, Roddy, Baileys Park, Rowland, Ocmulgee Banks, Royal, Paulk, Goldsboro, Cary and Godwinsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
